nodes.bodyText: What does this mean?
Duration.betweenSeconds(1, 2) returns an int range of [20, 40] (ticks) (for choosing a random integer in the interval)

nodes.bodyText: I think it could be shortened to findNearestWarpedFungi. The fact that hoglins need to see the fungi (and can't, for example, smell it) is just an implementation detail which can go in a comment.
Mojang call the sensor "nearest visible warped fungi", but your name is better.
What does "idle" mean? Shouldn't the idle task be the one that doesn't have the walkSpeed parameter (which you named AdmireItemTask)?
